constituent: badge, vase, stand up, sunflower, early, sun, day, ten, needle
heisigStory: Try to imagine a club badge pinned to your lapel in the form of a mammoth sunflower protruding from a wee little vase.
koohiiStory1: In the military, badges are given out early in the day, with everyone standing at attention.
koohiiStory2: Ash Ketchum stood up early in the morning, and said, "Pikachu, let´s go get us another badge!".
myStory: thẻ ra vào. huân chương. chương sách. một nội dung. đứng từ sớm để mua được chương sách mới ra
